meanings: (정보나 지식을 갖추다) know, learn, have (good) knowledge (of), be familiar (with)
(이해하다) understand, know, see, follow, appreciate, (informal) get, make out
(깨닫다, 인지하다) realize, recognize, find, notice, sense, (formal) perceive, be aware (of), be conscious (of)
Knowing too much is a disease, Where ignorance is bliss, it is folly to be wise, Ignorance is the peace of life
Knowing too much is a disease, Where ignorance is bliss, it is folly to be wise, Ignorance is the peace of life
in the manner of one being unaware of something, unwittingly
It is not of one's concern
think one knows something, but actually does not know it

vlive.korean: [알지만 다른 팀] 좋겠다! 나 이 노래 아는데! [I know but I'm on the other team] Good for you! I know this song! 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.17 노래방탈출 #1 (Escape Singing Room #1)
vlive.english: [I know but I'm on the other team] Good for you! I know this song!

vlive.korean: 항상 보고 싶은 건 알지만... I know you always miss us. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : Stray Kids(스트레이 키즈) “STEP OUT 2019" Director's Cut
vlive.english: I know you always miss us.

vlive.korean: 이미 다 알지만. Even though I know everything already. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST W] 막내 왓처 쩨아리와 함께하는 러브캐처 본방사수 준비📺
vlive.english: Even though I know everything already.

vlive.korean: '연락은 당연히 끊어야 되는 건 알지만 기분이 너무 안 좋네요'라고. "I know that I shouldn't talk to him, but I feel so upset." 듣기 View video INFINITE : 우현이 내게오나봐 잘사람자라디오 8화 우현이 내게오나봐 잘사람자라디오 8화
vlive.english: "I know that I shouldn't talk to him, but I feel so upset."

vlive.korean: [10m 메이크업 포인트 여자들은 알지만 남자들은 모르게!] - 여자들은 보면 안다 근데 - 여자들은 다 알죠. Women know when they see though. - All women know. 듣기 View video 뷰티로그(beautylog) : [뷰티로그 9회]쎈 언니 나르샤! 10m 100m 1Km 메이크업!
vlive.english: Women know when they see though. - All women know.

examples.korean: I know which area they live in, but whether I can find their house is a different matter. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들이 어느 지역에 사는지는 내가 알지만 내가 그들의 집을 찾을 수 있느냐는 다른 문제이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I know which area they live in, but whether I can find their house is a different matter. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I know it sounds trivial, but I’m worried about it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 하찮게 들린다는 거 알지만 난 그게 걱정이 돼요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I know it sounds trivial, but I’m worried about it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I know it sounds crazy but it just might work. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 말도 안 되는 소리같이 들린다는 거 알지만 그래도 효과가 있을지 몰라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I know it sounds crazy but it just might work. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I know you’re pushed, but can you make tomorrow’s meeting? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신 바쁜 줄 알지만, 내일 회의에 올 수 있겠어요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I know you’re pushed, but can you make tomorrow’s meeting? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘I know it’s expensive but it will last for years.’ ‘I should hope so too!’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “이게 비싸다는 것은 알지만 오래 갈[계속 쓸 수 있을] 거예요.” “나도 그렇기를 바래요!” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘I know it’s expensive but it will last for years.’ ‘I should hope so too!’ Add to Wordbook
